name: nextcloud-mail
description: Nextcloud Mail is an email client that integrates with IMAP servers, providing a unified inbox with clean UI, threading, filtering, and file sharing through the Nextcloud ecosystem.
features: IMAP integration: Connect to any IMAP email server with automatic configuration detection.
Unified inbox: View messages from multiple email accounts in a single interface.
Threaded conversations: Group related emails together for easier following of discussions.
Rich text editor: Compose emails with formatting, attachments, and inline images.
Contact integration: Access Nextcloud contacts for auto-completion and address book management.
File sharing: Attach files from Nextcloud storage or share large files via public links.
Search functionality: Find emails quickly by sender, subject, content, or date range.
Folder management: Organize emails into folders with drag-and-drop and custom sorting.
Spam filtering: Mark messages as spam and train filters to improve detection.
Mobile responsive: Access email from any device with adaptive layout and touch controls.
Encryption support: Send and receive encrypted emails with PGP/GPG integration.
Nextcloud integration: Seamlessly works within Nextcloud with unified authentication and storage.
